text: Josef Herschl (16 June 1897 - 13 July 1960Rapid Archiv) was an Austrian footballer. He played in the 1910s as goalkeeper. ==Career == Hersch played for VfB Mödling, Fünfhaus and SK Rapid Wien as goalkeeper. In the 1915-1916 season he became Austrian champion with SK Rapid Wien.Rapid Archiv ==Honours == Austrian championː 1916 ==References == Category:1897 births Category:1960 deaths Category:Austrian football goalkeepers Category:SK Rapid Wien players Category:Association football goalkeepers
title: Josef Herschl
